summary: A documentary exploring the life of the Blair Witch and the three missing student filmmakers.
cast: Frank Pastor|Rachel Braaten|Elaine Stebbins|Tom Williams|Randy Campbell|Dottie Corrigan|Stephen Edwards|Bill Dreggors|Buck Buchanan|Charlie Carlson|Michael Hoover|David Jones|Lisa Heesch|Joe Nagy|Minette Marcial|Lucan Johnson|Jim King|Heather Donahue|Michael C. title: Curse of the Blair Witch
